Package oracle.xml.xmldbaccess

Provides a Java bean to store and retrieve XML data from XMLType talbes in an Oracle database.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
XMLDBAccess This Bean is a simple extension of the DBAccess bean to support the XMLType Functionality that was introduced as a part of Oracle 9i database This bean lets user to create XMLType tables and store XML documents.
XMLDBAccessBeanInfo This class provides information for the non-graphical XMLDBAccess bean.
 

Package oracle.xml.xmldbaccess Description

Provides a Java bean to store and retrieve XML data from XMLType talbes in an Oracle database.

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
  • http://otn.oracle.com/xml
